user.title: Solar Forecast ML
user.description: Imagine this: A custom integration that predicts your solar power for today, tomorrow, and the next hour using machine learning â€“ learning from your real data, weather forecasts, and optional sensors. It gets smarter every day, accuracy climbs, and you save nerves (and electricity bills)! No YAML chaos â€“ everything set up via a slick UI Config Flow. Cool because it doesn't just forecast; it *understands* your setup and brings automations like "EV charge on peak sun" to life. Plug it in, and let the sun work for you!

data_description.weather_entity: Recommendation: DWD Weather for precise forecasts in Germany.
data_description.power_entity: This sensor must reset to 0 daily (e.g., sensor.solar_daily_yield).
data_description.plant_kwp: Example: 10.5. Used for better initial forecasts; the system will learn automatically afterward.
data_description.update_interval: How often sensor data should be collected. The actual forecast is only created once a day in the morning.
data_description.forecast_solar_sensor: A sensor like 'sensor.forecast_solar_today' for blending with our ML model (optional).
data_description.lux_sensor: Illuminance sensor (e.g., from weather station) for light intensity influence (optional).
data_description.temp_sensor: Temperature sensor for heat influence on yield (optional).
data_description.wind_sensor: Wind speed sensor (negative influence in strong wind, optional).
data_description.uv_sensor: UV index sensor for radiation influence (optional).
data_description.inverter_power_sensor: Your sensor for current solar yield (e.g., 'sensor.solar_current_power' in W). Checks if >10W (Inverter on) â€“ helps set forecasts to 0 on failures. Leave empty if not needed.
data_description.inverter_daily_yield: Your sensor for cumulative daily yield (e.g., 'sensor.solar_daily_production' from Fronius/SMA/Anker, in kWh). Optional, for robust checks at night/battery switches (>0.1 kWh = day active). Leave empty if using only the Power sensor.
data_description.enable_diagnostic: Enables 'Solar Forecast ML Status' sensor in dashboard â€“ shows 'Running normal' with details (e.g., Inverter status). Great for more transparency.
data_description.enable_hourly: Enables 'Solar Forecast ML Next Hour Forecast' sensor (kWh). Based on hourly weather forecast â€“ ideal for automations like EV charging in peak time.
